content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":263152,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐瘴気の中を走るが・・ばたりと倒れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Running through the dreadful miasma... but suddenly collapses."},{"lineNumber":263153,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜最終決戦　２６０／２／ケイブリス／戦闘前＞とほぼ同じだが若干違う","translatedEnglishLine":"Almost the same as <Final Battle 260/2/Cavebris/Before Battle>, but slightly different."},{"lineNumber":263154,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故、誰も知らせてこなかった、","translatedEnglishLine":"Why did no one come to inform me?"},{"lineNumber":263155,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやってここにきた？","translatedEnglishLine":"How did we arrive here?"},{"lineNumber":263156,"originalJapaneseLine":"聖魔教団の浮遊城を使って魔物界に来ていた連中・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who came to the demon world using the Holy Demon Cult's floating castle..."},{"lineNumber":263157,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時の振動、まさか・・あれか","translatedEnglishLine":"That vibration from that time, could it be... that?"},{"lineNumber":263158,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワンニャンはしらんぷり","translatedEnglishLine":"Wanyan acts indifferent."},{"lineNumber":263159,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフはワンニャンのミスには気が付くが、それは指摘しない","translatedEnglishLine":"Stroganoff notices Wanyan's mistake but does not point it out."},{"lineNumber":263160,"originalJapaneseLine":"全て自分の責任と思い罪を受け止めている","translatedEnglishLine":"He takes all the blame upon himself, accepting the guilt."},{"lineNumber":263161,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜最終決戦　２６０／３／サンセット合流＞のアレンジ","translatedEnglishLine":"An arrangement of <Final Battle 260/3/Sunset Rendezvous>."},{"lineNumber":263162,"originalJapaneseLine":"突入の際、衝撃で動けなかったメンバーが合流","translatedEnglishLine":"At the time of the assault, members who were immobilized by the shock catch up."},{"lineNumber":263163,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦での日々","translatedEnglishLine":"Days at Rance Fort."},{"lineNumber":263164,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t何か奥の建設中の通路から音が・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Some kind of sound is coming from the under-construction passage deep inside..."},{"lineNumber":263165,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Fort."},{"lineNumber":263166,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t暇をしているランスの元に緊急の報告","translatedEnglishLine":"An urgent report reaches Rance, who is idling."},{"lineNumber":263167,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t未完成の砦、奥の坑道が崩れて","translatedEnglishLine":"The unfinished fort's inner mineshaft has collapsed."},{"lineNumber":263168,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tモンスターの巣と接触した","translatedEnglishLine":"It connected to a monster's nest."},{"lineNumber":263169,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦内最奥","translatedEnglishLine":"The deepest part inside Rance Fort."},{"lineNumber":263170,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t壁が崩れてモンスターの巣と繋がった場所","translatedEnglishLine":"The place where the wall broke and connected to the monster's nest."},{"lineNumber":263171,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス達はさらにモンスターの巣へ進む","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others advance further into the monster's nest."},{"lineNumber":263172,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tモンスターの迷宮を進んでいると","translatedEnglishLine":"As they proceed through the monster maze..."},{"lineNumber":263173,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tポピンズ達と遭遇、仲間に加えます","translatedEnglishLine":"They encounter Poppins and others, and add them to their party."},{"lineNumber":263174,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tモンスターの巣に到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving at the monster's nest."},{"lineNumber":263175,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tボスが襲ってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"The boss attacks."},{"lineNumber":263176,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はボスを倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others defeat the boss."},{"lineNumber":263177,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス砦の安全は確保された","translatedEnglishLine":"The safety of Rance Fort is secured."},{"lineNumber":263178,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Fort."},{"lineNumber":263179,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t砦は補給に苦労している","translatedEnglishLine":"The fort is struggling with supplies."},{"lineNumber":263180,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tポピンズの地下道が使えたらいいのだが","translatedEnglishLine":"It would be great if they could use Poppins' underground tunnel."},{"lineNumber":263181,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが岩盤割りに出撃する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance sets out to break the rock bed."},{"lineNumber":263182,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t坑道はついに開通した","translatedEnglishLine":"The mineshaft finally opens."},{"lineNumber":263183,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tばんざーい","translatedEnglishLine":"Hooray!"},{"lineNumber":263184,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Fort Command Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":263185,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t補給は繋がったが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Supply lines are connected, but..."},{"lineNumber":263186,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t危機的状態は続く","translatedEnglishLine":"The critical situation continues."},{"lineNumber":263187,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Fort."},{"lineNumber":263188,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスと東芝王子が歩いている","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and Prince Toshiba are walking."},{"lineNumber":263189,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦、司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Fort, Command Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":263190,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t現状の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the current situation."},{"lineNumber":263191,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tブレイブ号を使って地下から魔物界へ","translatedEnglishLine":"Using the Brave to go underground to the monster world."},{"lineNumber":263192,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケイブリスを倒そう！","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's defeat Cavebris!"},{"lineNumber":263193,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t作戦をすっぽかしたランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance ditched the operation."},{"lineNumber":263194,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tブレイブ号に夢中","translatedEnglishLine":"Obsessed with the Brave."},{"lineNumber":263195,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどこかの迷宮・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhere in a labyrinth..."},{"lineNumber":263196,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tブレイブ号の材料集めに来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"They are gathering materials for the Brave."},{"lineNumber":263197,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t材料がなんとか揃った","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, they managed to gather all the materials."},{"lineNumber":263198,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス砦","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Fort."},{"lineNumber":263199,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tブレイブ号は魔物界に向けて出発する","translatedEnglishLine":"The Brave sets off toward the monster world."},{"lineNumber":263200,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tブレイブ号内","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the Brave."},{"lineNumber":263201,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t深度９０順調に進んでいます","translatedEnglishLine":"At depth 90, progressing smoothly."},{"lineNumber":263202,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t１日目の夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Night of Day 1."},{"lineNumber":263203,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t美樹も参加しています","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki is also participating."},{"lineNumber":263204,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２日目の夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Night of Day 2."},{"lineNumber":263205,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t少し暇です","translatedEnglishLine":"A bit of free time."},{"lineNumber":263206,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t３日目の夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Night of Day 3."},{"lineNumber":263207,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t狭い船内でもエロするランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has lewd fun even in the cramped ship."},{"lineNumber":263208,"originalJapaneseLine":"４日目の夜・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Night of Day 4..."},{"lineNumber":263209,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t５日目の夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Night of Day 5."},{"lineNumber":263210,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t美樹の様子が少し変","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki's condition is somewhat strange."},{"lineNumber":263211,"originalJapaneseLine":"６日目の夜・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Night of Day 6..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気の中を走るが・・ばたりと倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Running through the dreadful miasma... but suddenly collapses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／２／ケイブリス／戦闘前＞とほぼ同じだが若干違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost the same as <Final Battle 260/2/Cavebris/Before Battle>, but slightly different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故、誰も知らせてこなかった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did no one come to inform me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやってここにきた？
聖魔教団の浮遊城を使って魔物界に来ていた連中・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who came to the demon world using the Holy Demon Cult's floating castle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時の振動、まさか・・あれか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That vibration from that time, could it be... that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンニャンはしらんぷり
ストロガノフはワンニャンのミスには気が付くが、それは指摘しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff notices Wanyan's mistake but does not point it out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て自分の責任と思い罪を受け止めている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He takes all the blame upon himself, accepting the guilt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜最終決戦　２６０／３／サンセット合流＞のアレンジ
突入の際、衝撃で動けなかったメンバーが合流
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the time of the assault, members who were immobilized by the shock catch up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦での日々
何か奥の建設中の通路から音が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of sound is coming from the under-construction passage deep inside...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦
暇をしているランスの元に緊急の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An urgent report reaches Rance, who is idling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未完成の砦、奥の坑道が崩れて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The unfinished fort's inner mineshaft has collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターの巣と接触した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It connected to a monster's nest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦内最奥
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The deepest part inside Rance Fort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁が崩れてモンスターの巣と繋がった場所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The place where the wall broke and connected to the monster's nest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はさらにモンスターの巣へ進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others advance further into the monster's nest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターの迷宮を進んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they proceed through the monster maze...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズ達と遭遇、仲間に加えます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They encounter Poppins and others, and add them to their party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターの巣に到着
ボスが襲ってきた
ランス達はボスを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others defeat the boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦の安全は確保された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The safety of Rance Fort is secured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦
砦は補給に苦労している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fort is struggling with supplies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズの地下道が使えたらいいのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be great if they could use Poppins' underground tunnel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが岩盤割りに出撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance sets out to break the rock bed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 坑道はついに開通した
ばんざーい
ランス砦司令部
補給は繋がったが・・
危機的状態は続く
ランス砦
ランスと東芝王子が歩いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Prince Toshiba are walking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦、司令部
現状の説明
ブレイブ号を使って地下から魔物界へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using the Brave to go underground to the monster world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスを倒そう！
作戦をすっぽかしたランス
ブレイブ号に夢中
どこかの迷宮・・・
ブレイブ号の材料集めに来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are gathering materials for the Brave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 材料がなんとか揃った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, they managed to gather all the materials.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦
ブレイブ号は魔物界に向けて出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave sets off toward the monster world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブレイブ号内
深度９０順調に進んでいます
１日目の夜
美樹も参加しています
２日目の夜
少し暇です
３日目の夜
狭い船内でもエロするランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has lewd fun even in the cramped ship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４日目の夜・・・
５日目の夜
美樹の様子が少し変
６日目の夜・・

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did no one come to inform me?

聖魔教団の浮遊城を使って魔物界に来ていた連中・・

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He takes all the blame upon himself, accepting the guilt.

突入の際、衝撃で動けなかったメンバーが合流
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the time of the assault, members who were immobilized by the shock catch up.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of sound is coming from the under-construction passage deep inside...

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An urgent report reaches Rance, who is idling.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The unfinished fort's inner mineshaft has collapsed.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It connected to a monster's nest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦内最奥
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The deepest part inside Rance Fort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁が崩れてモンスターの巣と繋がった場所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The place where the wall broke and connected to the monster's nest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はさらにモンスターの巣へ進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others advance further into the monster's nest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターの迷宮を進んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they proceed through the monster maze...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズ達と遭遇、仲間に加えます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They encounter Poppins and others, and add them to their party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターの巣に到着
ボスが襲ってきた
ランス達はボスを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others defeat the boss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦の安全は確保された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The safety of Rance Fort is secured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦
砦は補給に苦労している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fort is struggling with supplies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズの地下道が使えたらいいのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be great if they could use Poppins' underground tunnel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが岩盤割りに出撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance sets out to break the rock bed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 坑道はついに開通した
ばんざーい
ランス砦司令部
補給は繋がったが・・
危機的状態は続く
ランス砦
ランスと東芝王子が歩いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Prince Toshiba are walking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦、司令部
現状の説明
ブレイブ号を使って地下から魔物界へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using the Brave to go underground to the monster world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスを倒そう！
作戦をすっぽかしたランス
ブレイブ号に夢中
どこかの迷宮・・・
ブレイブ号の材料集めに来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are gathering materials for the Brave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 材料がなんとか揃った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, they managed to gather all the materials.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス砦
ブレイブ号は魔物界に向けて出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave sets off toward the monster world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブレイブ号内
深度９０順調に進んでいます
１日目の夜
美樹も参加しています
２日目の夜
少し暇です
３日目の夜
狭い船内でもエロするランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has lewd fun even in the cramped ship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４日目の夜・・・
５日目の夜
美樹の様子が少し変
６日目の夜・・
